tgt_original: 如《彌勒解脫經》云： 善男子譬！

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,  vajraratnanāma ca na vijahāti,  sarvadāridyaṃ ca vinivartayati,
tgt_original: 如有人不取大金剛寶，別得一切金莊嚴具，而亦不捨大金剛寶，於貧窮者而能普濟。 善男子！

src_original: evameva kulaputra pratipattibhinnamapi sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,  bodhicittanāma ca na vijahāti,  saṃsāradāridyaṃ ca vinivartayatīti //
tgt_original: 菩薩亦復如是，不取一切智心大金剛寶，別得一切聲聞緣覺功德金莊嚴具，而亦不捨彼菩薩行，所有一切輪迴貧窮者而能普濟。
是故從菩提心出生方便，成就大菩提果。
如《如來示教勝軍王經》云，佛言：

src_original: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,  yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum /
tgt_original: 若汝所作多種事業，於一切種一切處，應共布施波羅蜜多乃至般若波羅蜜多相應而學。

src_original: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evameva saṃbodhicchandaṃ śraddhāṃ prārthanāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca,  gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi jāgradapi bhuñjāno 'pi pibannapi,  satatamamitamanusmara,  manasi kuru, bhāvaya /
tgt_original: 是故大王！ 汝應如是，於正等覺起欲信求願趣向等心，若住若行、若臥若立、若飲若食、若諸所作，決定常時思念作意，觀想一切佛、菩薩、緣覺、聲聞。

src_original: sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakapṛthagjanānāmātmanaśca atītānāgatapratyutpannāni kuśalamūlānipiṇḍayitvā tulayitvā anumodayasva agrayā anumodanayā /  anumodya ca sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ pūjākarmāṇi niryātaya /  niryātya ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kuru /
tgt_original: 諸愚夫異生及己身等，所有過去未來現在一切善根合集一處，發勝上心，自當隨喜已，普於一切佛菩薩緣覺聲聞眾中供養承事所有功德，與一切眾生共之。

src_original: tataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāpratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya  evaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ san rājyaṃ ca kārayiṣyasi,
tgt_original: 普願眾生乃至得一切智，一切佛法皆悉圓滿。 若日日三時迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，大王！

src_original: rājyakṛtyāni ca na hāpayiṣyasi,  bodhisaṃbhārāṃśca paripūrayiṣyasi //
tgt_original: 汝所作事皆得清淨，菩提行等亦悉成就。

src_original: sa khalu punastvaṃ mahārāja samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlavipākena anekakṛtvo deveṣu upapanno 'bhūḥ /
tgt_original: 阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，所生善根果報無數，若生人中、或生天上，於一切處常得最勝。

src_original: tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet,  sattvamantareṇa kimālambya pravarteta?  karuṇā ca samyaksaṃbodhisādhanam,  tatpūrvakameva saṃbhāranidāneṣu dānādiṣu pravartanāt /  ataḥ karuṇāpuraḥsarāḥ sarve buddhadharmāḥ pravartante /
tgt_original: 所有最勝一切佛法，皆由悲心而為根本，此悲所因為觀眾生故。

src_original: tathā coktamāryadharmasaṃgītau-  atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 如《聖法集經》云，爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩白佛言： 世尊！

src_original: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
tgt_original: 諸菩薩不應修學多種法門，但於一法而自勤行，即於一切法如掌中得。 何等一法？
所謂大悲。 諸菩薩乘此大悲，即於一切佛法如掌中得。 世尊！

src_original: tadyathā- yena rājñaścakravartinaścakraratnaṃ gacchati,  tena sarvabalakāyo gacchati /
tgt_original: 譬如轉輪聖王輪寶行處，即得一切力聚。

src_original: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati,  tena sarve buddhadharmā gacchanti /
tgt_original: 而諸菩薩亦復如是，大悲行處，即能成就一切佛法力聚。
